title: Aarya Diamond Pendant - A Timeless Treasure
materials: 22K Gold (8.150 G Wt) with Natural Diamonds (7.97 N Wt). Features a fine Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This pendant showcases a symmetrical, geometric design featuring round diamonds set in a classic bezel setting. The openwork filigree adds a delicate, airy feel. The center consists of a square shape of diamonds, surrounded by additional circular patterns with even more stones.
colors: Warm golden hue complemented by the brilliant white sparkle of the diamonds.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions such as weddings
and formal gatherings. A versatile piece that can be worn with both traditional sarees and contemporary outfits.
description: This diamond pendant is a true heirloom piece, crafted with meticulous attention to detail. The use of high-quality gold and diamonds ensures lasting beauty and value. Its traditional design with a modern twist makes it a timeless addition to any jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi polish adds to its radiance, making it a captivating statement piece.
